26.1.hd_quote: The ability to enjoy the dreams engendered by accomplishment in order to avoid delusion of unlikely potential.
26.1.behavioral_axis: Builds confidence by banking real wins; protects energy with rest and realistic expectations.
26.1.shadow_axis: Coasts on past success; entitlement after a win.

26.2.hd_quote: The energy and depth of reflection to learn from the past in anticipation of the future.
26.2.behavioral_axis: Learns public accountability; reputation management through truthful tracking.
26.2.shadow_axis: Paper-tiger bravado; gets ‘found out’ without records.

26.3.hd_quote: The ability, once prepared, to gather support.
26.3.behavioral_axis: Iterates a persuasive craft and mobilizes backing when conditions are right.
26.3.shadow_axis: Manipulative tactics; burned trust through shortcuts.

26.4.hd_quote: The alteration of memory through elimination.
26.4.behavioral_axis: Shapes narrative by pruning details; practices strategic discretion.
26.4.shadow_axis: Omission that erodes trust; ‘something’s missing’ aura.

26.5.hd_quote: The power of memory which maximizes the potential of the ego to attract others.
26.5.behavioral_axis: Reads the room and adjusts the message to maximize buy-in.
26.5.shadow_axis: Stubborn method; resistance to adjusting technique.

26.6.hd_quote: The natural attainment of influence justified by the correctness of actions.
26.6.behavioral_axis: Holds fire until correctness is clear; then acts and embodies authority.
26.6.shadow_axis: Symbolic authority with little substance; aloofness.
